generated_text: In Module 24: Data, explore the fundamentals of data in ICAIL. This 21-minute video covers data types, sources, and applications, with interactive examples and case studies. Learn to collect, analyze, and interpret data to inform decisions and drive outcomes. Suitable for intermediate learners, this module provides practical skills and knowledge to enhance your ICAIL expertise.
